Review Title: Uber Unfair Practices and Cancellation of Rides
Review Body:
user these days it has become so difficult to get a cabbooking on your pp wherein your allocate drivers who are next to impossible always ask to pay in cash whereas you already chosen to pay online yesterday was one of that days i tried to book a cab from news railway station and i had the worst experience ever with your services

1 3 cab drivers canceled it after accepting the ride saying that if you pay in cash then only we will come to pick you up or cancel by yourself
2 another driver who accepted the ride and came was asking for toll charges additional which he paid for routine from inside the news railway station
3 2 another cab drivers denied the ride after accepting the same saying that cancel it through user and we will take you personally at the same price in cash

total accepted booking 6 ride none

under the section 178 in the motor vehicles act 1988 all these acts are punishable and subject to penalty

and this was not it usually if i book user in my day to day journey then the fare shown at the time of booking and the fare deduced from my walletcard always vary on the higher side why
foi these are termed as unfair trade practices

user freight

i‚Äôm from cape town south africa i use user daily i‚Äôve been on user since 2014 i started out with a 498 score i‚Äôm now at 46

i am always waiting at the correct pick up
i never make my driver wait
i never eat or drink in their vehicle
i always greet and thank my driver
i always tip 20 via the pp
i am always courteous and polite
i never slam my door
i always wear my seatbelt
i always rate my drivers 5 as in aware their jobs are at stake

it‚Äôs recently been brought to my attention that in south africa if you don‚Äôt want your rating to drop practically like mine has you should tip ‚Äî very very generously at least upwards of 25 and it must always be cash never via the pp it also helps if you offer to buy them takeaway

essentially if you are a tourist in south africa or a citizen such as myself be prepared to bribe your driver extremely generously or risk your rating dropping practically

user south africa drivers generally score everyone a 3 this is based on the fact that they are frustrated with user south africa not putting up their rates despite a substantial petrol increase in sa so this affects their takehome pay

rule of thumb in south africa  people are paid very badly tip  tip everybody and tip very generously

Review Title: Uber is shafting you all the way aroundUber is shafting you all the way around
Review Body: this review is basically for the people that drive for user the irs has just recently raised the mileage deduction to 62 cents per mile that is just what the irs thinks it costs you to drive a mile it is higher than that i can assure you any ride that you give that 62 cents times the total miles to pick up and then to drop off should be considered i can assure you if you do not file a long form tax return for deductions you are actually losing money dont even consider the tickets that you might get even if you are a conscientious driverwhat about a driver that hits you and its his fault this is called  uninjured motorist and if you dont have a commercial policy there is a high likelihood if it is a severe wreck that your insurance will not pay 4 any damages your personal policy might reject any claims you might not need to consider this if you have no asset but be forewarned if you have asset then you better assess your risk management criteriaim not even going to bring up that you better file  quarterly reports for your income tax and remember your also responsible for the employer portion as well as the employees here this may include medicine deductions as well as unemployment deductions even though you are a contractor depending on your state of occupation it will be around 15 that is not income tax that is taken after adjusted gross income you may get away with skirving some of these regulations for months and even years but when i catch you you will be in debt for a very long time pro  tip  widen is in the process of hiring 84000 more auditory for the irs pay your taxes for all you user riders go for it you are getting one hell of a good rate take user sometime and then take a taxi for the exact same run you will see that the taxi cost much more and just look at the conditions of their cars good luck and travel safe

Review Title: My interaction with apps on a phone is‚Ä¶
Review Body: my interaction with apes on a phone is challenged as it is and i did not find the user pp very easy to use  the now button with the little conspicuous dropdown arrow for shedding a picked time was one of my downfall  the first time i used the pp on 103 i must have locked into hitting the dropdown arrow  i wanted to schedule a picked at least a balfour out and that is what i was able to do however hitting that little dropdown arrow was not intentional  when i went to use the pp again on 105 i just hit the little button on the front to schedule a picked and much to my surprise it went into an immediate ride request mode that i could not get out of  i could find no way to get to a schelling page  after about 30 seconds i did find a way to cancel the ride request but of course i had to pay a 600 inconvenience fee  so a slightly different button design for now vs schedule requests would be nice  two buttons maybe  there were other things that confused me too so improvements to the pp are in orderthe two rides themselves were fast comfortable and expert driven and the drivers were obviously very knowlegable  they were also graciously friendly and welcoming  i will certainly use user again when i next need to but the pp and my use of it   needs a little work

i like user for many reasons ease of use able to pay with phone safety of having records of the drivers incise they do something bad to you what i hate is they dont compromise if your disabled i ordered a user today and the pick up marker went to the wrong place it was close to me but a fair walk down the road
i rung the user driver saying can you drive down the road a bit i wont make the 8 minute cut off point because i struggle to walk
he didn answer me about driving up and said something like keep walking i will wait here i said user cancers automatically you can wait and we got cut off and i got really distraught because i knew i wouldn‚Äôt make it on time and will be charged for the fact my legs dont work properly

i really strained myself and was in immense pain trying to make it to the end of the road sobbing and packing all the way just as i got to the point he was suppose to be there he was no where to be seen and i got the notice that my user is canceled and i got charged nearly ¬£7 for the drivers inconvenience
i got so upset that my disability that badly affects me always seems to affect user this is not the first time this has happened because of my disability there needs to be something in place to be more helpful for people with disabilities its not fair

if you drive for user they make up reasons to keep any referral they offer you‚Ä¶ they stole 700 from
me 50 supervisors later and still they refuse to issue the referral after the driver i referred finished his trips

i was picked up late in the evening as the driver pulled up to my house i told her to pull up behind my husbands vehicle so she didn block the side street she drove a few feet further as if she didn hear me  and proceeded to block the road a car was waiting for her to move out of the way she got very flustered  yankee my suitcase out of her trunk and took off my backpack containing my wallet charge and epilepsy meditation was still in her car i managed to catch her at the end of my street  i was running shouting waving my arms she either ignored me or didn see me i promptly called user support which connected me to her she wouldn answer so i left a message she never responded to me i called her a few times the following morning before she finally picked up her excuse was she turned off her alert or whatever when she went into the grocer store less than a block away from my house to use the restroom she said she then picked up another passenger her user pp was off so she never received calls or messages but she picked up another client right after me she said she realized the mistake when the passenger handed her my backpack thinking it was hers i was frustrated but let her know that i could meet her in a parking lot or a public place near where she lived so she didn have to go out of her way she declined and brought it back to me that evening despite all of this i was still charged a 15 return bag fee one of my meditations was missing from the backpack i wrote several email explaining all this to user support and they just kept sending back the patentee response that my driver had to go out of her way to return my bag i will never use user again

user charged ¬£418 for a cancellation fee for a trip canceled by the driver contracted customer service who said the fee was to compensate the driver agent eventually agreed refund for any enterprise to charge any fee for a service that their employeeagent canceled is ludicrous user used to offer a good service no longer the case wont be using again

Review Title: No show with my Reserved & Confirmed Uber

Review Title: Hit and miss in Ireland - go Bolt instead
Review Body: recently went on holiday in ireland and sadly found the user service to be hit and miss getting from the airport to our destination we were able to get an user no problem friendly service and even gave the driver a tip however our return journey was a different matter and a complete nightmare needing to get to the airport to catch our flight we tried booking user again only to find the pp having trouble finding a driver even though the map showed a few in the area we got connected to a driver three times and in each case they canceled on us presumably because they either didn like our location or they got a better fare this delayed us by an hour and made the journey back more distressful than it should ever have been  one driver even asked us to cancel the booking as we were too far only 8 minutes away and tried to pass on a 500 neuro cancellation fee which we declined as we had seen a couple of bolt taxes in the area we download their pp and booked them instead  thankful we had allowed enough time to get to the airport things could have turned out very differently will look to use bolt first in future
the extra security such as  driver ilyin codevehicle id was of a great help

Review Title: Uber charged me for its own fault
Review Body:
i feel like users service has been getting worse over last few months however what happened today was completely unacceptable

i have book a taxi from a hotel to an airport the driver arrived at a different spot not in front of the hotel it took a couple of minutes to me to realise the the driver is not going to the hotel and then 23 minutes to find the car only to see him leaving the place and saying he canceled the job i had to ebook the taxi the second time and wait for taxi to arrive the second time

what is even worse instead of apologizing for the inconvenience user charged me

to compensate drivers for the inconvenience a fee is charged if the driver has to cancel after waiting for more than 5 minutes at your requested picked location to avoid this fee in the future only request when your ready to go

i cannot even dispute the fee because users sites constantly show me the following error for the last few hours

something went wrong please try again later
sorry an error has occurred but we have been notified and are looking into it

it appears to me that the time to try out alternatives just has come

dont know if anyone else is having the same issues as me but give been experiencing this for the last few months that give been using user ride taxi service

so here what happens  you launch the pp click on ride and select where you are going etc you see the price of the journey and agree to the booking the pp then connect you to the driver of your price choice in this case it was ¬£850

the connection process takes forever and often does connect so naturally you assume that there is an issue with the pp and cancel the connection i believe this is because the driver who user is connecting you with isn accepting the fare you then start the booking process again only to find that the same car that had originally prices your joined is now ¬£1650 you also see a list of 2 other vehicles that have almost doubled in price too how is it that within a few seconds of a booking the price can soar to almost double clearly there is something going on here

it is unbelievable
the drivers pay for the car gas insurance energy their precious time and everything to drive people around however user is taking 50 to 65 of the money that the customers are paying
if this is not a crime and highly abusive company the meaning of fairness and law do not have any value in the united states

Review Body: outdoing driver stopped 3 times in first five minutes and seemed prepared for the journey coming home driver marked over a mile away from picked point and i was physically unable to get to him so phone to give him another picked point by which time he had made his way to the original picked point waited for him to pick me up at the place i told him i was but he didn‚Äôt arrive and the next message said my ride had been canceled because i hadn‚Äôt got to him in time ridiculous as he was to blame but i‚Äôm ¬£55 out of pocket and strange in london needing to get to essex first time using ober thinking it would be reliable and sadly i was wrong lesson learned and won‚Äôt make that call again

Review Title: Not sure why Uber is not taking any‚Ä¶
Review Body:
not sure why user is not taking any action on the improvement as nearly 90 of population giving bad reviews
i had bad experience today as well where the drivers canceled the trips after knowing about the location worst experience ever

arrived at london boston ordered a taxi no confirmation of either acceptance of job or details of vehicle

minutes later my phone rings it‚Äôs the driver of my unconfirmed taxi telling me to meet him in eversholt st

i ask him where is eversholt st in relation to the exit of boston station he reply‚Äôs i have no idea i don‚Äôt know this area but he tells me he‚Äôs driving a grey kit i goose map the area and find eversholt st is to the left of the station as you exit i arrive just in time to see my user ride load up with two other people and drive off my subsequent requests for a taxi are met with ‚Äúloops we have a problem‚Äù i abandon the hope of user fulfilling its commitment and walk 45 minutes to my hotel

the next day user send me an email telling me that they have charged me for a missed appointment you cheeks shower of bastards your drivers don‚Äôt have a clue where they are and you have the audacity to charge people who are let down by this dreadful system i‚Äôm meeting your pp you hopeless shower of cap

i arranged a ride to and from baptist eastpoint  be for a friend this past week he had never taken user and is somewhat cognitive ‚Äúslow‚Äù the ride to be went very well i was able to text the driver to explain the situation and he worked with me to wait for my friend to come to the car and insure my friend recognized his car and took it to be
on the return trip i wasn‚Äôt as fortunate my friend said he was on the ‚Äú first floor‚Äù which i noted in the notes i contracted my friend when the car arrived and saying he didn‚Äôt see anyone he said he was at the surgery center entrance which i know from experience is on the lower level in the back of the building i contracted the driver via message and asked that he drive around to the lower level entrance i did not hear back from the driver and promptly received a notice of the ride being canceled which i was charged for the second attempt went better as i had the correct location from my friend
up front i tried to explain in the notes about the situation so the drivers would understand it may take a few extra minutes for me to let my friend know they arrived so he would go outside to the car i also apologized for any inconvenience and tapped generously
i understand the second driver may not have understood english as well and possibly didn‚Äôt understand what i was asking or it could have been for other reasons that he left
it was unfortunate that i could not be in town to take my friend but i tried to make arrangements for him as best i could you know the saying ‚Äú no good deed goes unpunished ‚Äú üòÇ i don‚Äôt know how to improve the process for arranging rides for others but perhaps it could somehow be made simpler this was all extremely time consuming for me communicating between my friend and the drivers i hope this helps you in some way
thanks

Review Title: Dumped on the M25 hard shoulder at night !
Review Body: my 22 year old daughter ordered an user at 10 pm last night to go from a friends house to home after 20 minutes she realised they were going the wrong way and had got onto the may when she asked the driver where they were going he replied hounslow home is northward the driver refused to turn around or to drop my daughter to a petrol station instead he pulled over on the hard shoulder of the may and asked her to get out my distraught daughter then hid in a bush and called me luckily we have an pp where i could see her location the police are now involved and have said this is happening more and more after that narrowing experience user have said they will look into it but sadly the help line is is indonesia where they didn‚Äôt even know what a hard shoulder is user is meant to be a safe experience my advice is never get in user as a lone female disgusting

Review Title: Dodgy company, no phone support, avoidance of paying promotions
Review Body:
in feb of 2022 i needed some extra cash and a promotion was running to sign up and complete 30 delivered in melbourne to get a sign up bonus of 750 i completed this by 30022022 i did not receive the bonus

i contracted the support number who advised that my sign up date was december 2020 when i looked at signing up but didn complete the process and that i was registered in mornington peninsula

my drivers license car registration and my national crime check that was supplied all had my melbourne address so they have registered my city incorrectly

my sign up date according to the email sent in june of 2021 advising i could not sign up until my national crime check was completed could not have been any earlier than the 12022022 when this was completed and my user account was activate

i have called 25 times had over 20 genetic email stating that my sign up date was 2020 and my city is registered as the mornington peninsula give had 3 promised phone calls from the excavations team and have had no answer as to why these details are incorrect rendering my eligibility for the promotion null and void

the user support line will not support you you will be told it will be excavated and you will receive the same genetic email every time when you respond to the genetic email they send the same genetic email again this has been continuous for 10 days now with no resolution in sight

be very weary about signing up to be a driver they will do everything they can to avoid fixing mistakes or contracting you back there is plenty more completion out there these days so i strongly suggest working elsewhere

Review Title: I have been an Uber driver for over 6‚Ä¶
Review Body: i have been an user driver for over 6 years and the entire time i have been abused stolen from and ignored by user their overall trustpilot rating is a long overdue indicator of what i have been through with user during a significant portion of my life give remained with them for six years solely because of the flexibility they offer to log on and off of the pp whenever i need to this is because drivers are supposed to be independent contractors operating as an independent business entity but this is absolutely not the case considering the unprecedented control user has over its drivers as a longstanding driver with user i can back up all of the seemingly outrageous claims other drivers have made against this horrified company if you are a passenger who had a bad experience with a driver i apologize but i also want you to understand that drivers are treated horribly by this predator company and therefore have very little incentive to perform at normal standards let alone go above and beyond when they pick you up chances are they are already not in a good place emotional or financially so please take this into consideration i urge anyone thinking about doing business with user as a customer or driver to think twice and look at other alternatives thanks for hearing me out

Review Title: Uber driver endangered my life at 9PM
Review Body:
it was 9 pm pouring rain and i had a bag and a box of groceries i had been request the service for over 10 minutes on other apes to no avail and for some odd reason i decided to try user i have been taking ridesharing apes for many years with very few negative experiences however the experience i had with user tonight definitely makes me want to bethink getting my own transportation

the first thing the driver did once i got into his car was ask me why my trepoff location was so far basically insinuating that he might just cancel the ride on me bearing in mind it is 9 pm and raining i was feeling especially vulnerable he reluctantly asked for a few more indications and sighed i was already feeling uneasy at about 10 minutes from the actual trepoff point he said okay were arrived i was stunned he was actually trying to drop me off much sooner in a very safe area while it was raining at pm at night i packed and said this is not the trepoff point sir please take me to the trepoff point

i was concerned as he reluctantly continued driving to the destination obviously worried now that this man was just going to leave me wherever he felt like leaving me

as soon as we arrived at the trepoff location he proceeded to overcharge me for the trip and although i protested i obliged to pay a little more

to my surprise this arc reported after this entire ordeal that i had actually underpaid him and i swiftly received an additional charge to my phone

this man was willing to place my life in danger and yet not happy with that also decides he wanted to screw me over with the pp as well

way to go user you really do know how to make a person feel safe

Review Title: Fare doubled without notice because of driver shortage!
Review Body:

Review Title: Uber uncooperative with police investigation and aids in the runaway of a 14 year old child
Review Body:
Ôªø i have a grave concern and i want to bring my experience to others knowledge
Ôªøi want people to understand the seriousness in the dangers of user and their poor business model in aiding the trafficking of young girls in major retro areas
my 14 year old daughter who looks young for her age ran away yesterday she stole my cell phone download the user pp and hailed an user car to a country private heavily wooded road with no houses the user driver picked up an obvious young minor with several backpacks on her in a wooded area took her across county lines and dropped her off at a train station in a very urban area
when detective and police contracted user to get any information on my missing child they refused to cooperate or release any into on her ride destination picked location or even what she was wearing
the city she was dropped off in is a major child trafficking area and user was careless sympathetic and cooperative in helping locate my missing 14 year old daughter when a child is missing time is of the essence in a safe recovery and not only was user cooperative but also hindered our precious time in locating her

i want everyone to be aware of this i want user‚Äôs policy to change regarding missing child investigations there business priority should be the absolute safety of both passengers and drivers and that means being transparent when a child is missing with the help of a careless and improperly trained driver their drivers should be highly trained to be able to discern at risk children and child trafficking signs

i‚Äôve reached out to user and their official response refers back to their privacy policy their webster policy shows age purification required on all pickets and no riders under the age of 18 without an adult obviously neither of these safety measurespolicies were followed with my daughter

do not use terrible service now pre ordered to get to an important appointment this morning the driver was running late and then suddenly canceled disaster used to be fairly reliable and prompt but now awful

Review Title: Uber condones Verbal Harrassment, aggressive driving, and endangerment to passengers

unfortunately i had a terrible experience with user today my fiance and i forgot our mass in our hotel room upon entering the vehicle of the user driver he requested and asked if we had mass my fiance responded that we did not  forgot ours but he would run to the front desk quick  1 minute and would grab two for us and apologized the user driver did not allow us to exit the car and started pulling off he then started aggressive verbalizing that we need mask and of the reasons for it we then told him again before existing the parking lot that we could exit the car and cancel our trip he would not allow us to exit he verbally said with an aggressive tone ‚Äú this is a general conversation stop talking  listen‚Äù i did not take this well as it was an inappropriate conversation and the tone was set from the start of the trip he then continued to grass us regarding the trip we made it known that we would like to exit the car immediately after he pulled out of the hotel parking lot he sped over three lanes almost causing an accident and kicked us out of the car with inappropriate language and aggressiveness ‚Äú get out‚Äù we almost got hit getting out the car and then he almost hit us when he executed a turn while rolling down his window to scream at us i immediately reported the entire situation to user support not only did they responded with saying that my concerns comments are dull noted they charged three dollars more the the fare price the customer stopped team is the worst i‚Äôve experienced in my lifetime not only does user support ‚Äú suck‚Äù
user the company confines verbal harassment endangerment to passengers and aggressive driving

Review Title: Your loss is Uber‚Äôs gain - and they WILL always aim to keep it that way!
Review Body:
yet another awful experience and now it is clear they will never be incentivised to change this i will never use this company again and not because such a service is not needed generally speaking  it‚Äôs because of the terrible management and business structure causing issues right across its user base including many of the drivers who are simply trying to make a living

i had an important trip booked for this morning schedule well ahead of time as usual user does not take any responsibility for their commitment to their users and allow trips to be canceled due to ‚Äúno drivers being available‚Äù right before they are schedule  suggesting that you should ‚Äútry requesting another trip‚Äù as soon as you try this you will find there are in fact plenty of drivers available but the price has now gone up at least 3 times the original price in my case ¬£26 instead of the original ¬£68 this trip was only around 3 miles which cost me ¬£7 with a local taxi company who were very grateful for the fare once canceled by user there is no record of the trip on your account nor can you ask any questions or give any feedback hence the surge of people taking to trustpilot and other review platforms to express their frustration

the issue here is user take a large percentage of the fare meaning they are going to be even more profitable if and when users accept this late minute like in prices out of desperation thanks to the last minute cancellation from user coming from a teach and business background this up would be a very straightforward fix and absolutely well within user‚Äôs power to change  and yet they still choose not to

Review Title: Riders lose money cos of Uber's hidden unfair conditions
Review Body:
my experience with user shows they lack transparent and integrity they seem to have change their policies in ways that benefit them and their driverpartners at the expense of the riders
recently they launched the hours rate product
user claims that when a rider select the hours product the rider is informed that the full set rate applies even if the trip is completed before end of the first hour
this is so not true i informed them about this and they just kept repeating same thing like a broken root
i even sent them a screenshot showing what riders see when hours rate product is selected and this information is not displayed
they responded repeating the same lie and attached a link to how hours rates are prices
they hid this very vital information that fares for selected hours are nonadjustablenonrefundable in a link that doesn even show up when riders make a request so essentially no rider sees the information on nonadjustablenonrefundable set fares except you go searching for pricking information beyond the fare displayed when you request a ride

in this case i selected 3 hours because i had 2 meetings which i expected to last for about 1 hour 30 minutes and lunch appointment for 30 minutes factories in transit time between locations i figured 3 hours should cover it however both my appointments were rescheduled when i got to those locations so the trip ended up lasting for only 1 hour 40 minutes user charged me for the full 3 hours and the driverpartner left to do more trips for the unused portion of my 3 hours booking
despite my appeals user refused to adjust the fare to 2 hours rate which is still more than the total time used but i was willing to accept that so i lost money on the trip i also told them the information on nonrefundable hours rate fares is not displayed when hours product is selected all i said fell on the deaf ears of user

another incident
in my current geographical location many driverpartners complain when you do not use cash payment method and unfortunately having change in this location is also very difficult so i used to select cash payment where the driverpartner doesn have change user would credit my wallet with the change however i found out the hard way that user puts a limit on the number of times you can request change be added to your user wallet when you overlay with cash for a ride so in this incident i selected a cash payment due to circumstances beyond my control the driverpartner did not have change he asked me to contact user support so the change will be created to my user wallet
user support said because they had created my wallet with change for my one of my previous trips they cannot give me change for this trip i explained to them that its different tripsdifferent payments none of the drivers were disputing my claim for change because they were all aware
there was some back and forth with user but they just kept repeating the same thing so i lost money on that ride as well
till today user has failed to share a link to their policy on requesting change be created to your wallet riders are not informed of this when selecting cash payments we only see a notice asking us to have exact fare but in a location where exact fare in change is almost always impossible we are forced to make bank transfers to the drivers bank account provided there network service or look for change around or forfeit our change

please do your personal thorough research before you use any user productsservice they have hidden unfair business practices and conditions that will drain your pockets as a rider dont rely on user or any of their driverpartners to disclose anything to you beforehand

Review Title: Customer Service DOESNT EXIST! 4 Months waiting!
Review Body:
customer service doesn exist 4 months waiting

i have tried to get in contact with users customer service since march of this year i have a pending payment on my account which does not allow me to order food or taxes the money has already been paid out from my bank  the money is gone  but the payment is still pending i even tried to pay it again but i can do that either it doesn process the payment on the webster or in the pp obviously i do not want to pay for this twice but at least i tried to solve this on my own

i reached out to user on facebook since it was so hard to find a way to contact their support on the pp or on their webster finally i was able to send a request i got an answer from a root in the next 48 hours and i replied and explain my issue again  no response i waited for a week  no response i wrote again  no response i sent another reminder after a few days  no response i wrote to user again on facebook they responded and asked me to have patience so i waited two weeks passed without any updated or responses then i saw in the pp that my case had been closed so i reached out to user on facebook again since that the only way to get a reply from them they replied and said sorry and asked me to make another request so i did that i got a response within a week i replied and explained my issue for the th time and they responded with we have technical issues with this at we will get back to you i answered this email again when a couple of days to a week had passed  no response i waited two days and remained again  no response i informed user on facebook that it has been two months since i contracted them for the first time without receiving any help or clarification they just told me to be patient in sorry but two months is being patient now it has been four months since i first contracted user to help me with this issue apparently users who want to use the pp are not worth helping

i work with customer support myself so i know how it is in this business but i have never seen anything like this before this is totally unacceptable for paying customers their staff is obviously overlooked and have no time for the oncoming tickets

i have used user since the day they launched in sweden give never had any problems before but as the company grew so fast the quality started lacking i feel bad for all of the staff  customer support drivers and food delivery people all of them are underpaid and overlooked this is really showing to us customers now much more apparent than it did a couple of years ago

in extremely disappointed
